# Appliance Repairs in Stamford/Wallingford CT
- At 3rd Person Appliance Repairs, we service Westchester County NY and Fairfield/Hartford County CT. We offer the best service at the best price for most appliance brands, specializing in LG refrigerator repair. Call us today at 631-339-9040.
